畤字的基本解释

畤
zhì
古代祭祀天地五帝的固定处所。
水中的小块陆地：“归雁映兰畤。”
田际；田界。
土高出的地方。
古通“庤”，储备。
古通“沚”，小渚。

畤
chóu
古同“畴”，地名。

畤
shì
古同“蒔”，移栽；分种。

畤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》直里切，上止，澄。］
［《廣韻》諸市切，上止，章。］
［《廣韻》時止切，上止，禪。］
(1)古时帝王祭祀天地五帝的场所。
(2)田界。
(3)通“沚”。水中的小洲。

畤字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【田字部】　畤； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页762第07
【唐韻】周市切【集韻】渚市切【韻會】諸市切，?音止。【說文】天地五帝所基址祭地也。【史記·秦本紀】祠上帝西畤。【索隱註】襄公始列爲諸侯，自以居西畤。西畤，縣名，故作西畤，祠白帝。畤，止也。言神靈之所依止也。【前漢·郊祀志】作畦。畤師古註如種韭畦之形於畦中，各爲一土封也。又祠之必於高山之下畤，命曰畤。註名其祭處曰畤。【括地志】秦文公夢黃蛇自天而下屬地，其口止於鄜衍，作畤郊祭白帝，曰鄜畤。秦宣公作密畤於渭南祭靑帝，秦靈公作吳陽上畤祭黃帝，作下畤亦祠黃帝。　又地名。【左傳·襄三十年】成愆奔平畤。【註】平畤，周邑。又【哀四年】國夏伐晉，取郉任欒鄗，逆畤隂人盂壷口。【後漢·光武紀】杜茂與賈覽戰於繁畤。【註】繁畤，縣名，屬鴈門郡。今代州縣。　又【廣韻】時止切【集韻】士止切，?音市。又【廣韻】直里切【集韻】【韻會】丈里切，?音峙。義?同。　又【集韻】時吏切，音雉。與蒔同。　又【五音集韻】池爾切，音豸。儲也。

考證：〔【前漢·

畤字的起名意思

本意是古代祭祀天地五帝的固定处所，也指水中的小块陆地，小渚。

ancient sacrifice

["Guangyun" cut straight, top stop, clear. ]
["Guangyun" all cities cut, top stop, chapter. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Tian Zi Department] 　畤; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 762 No. 07
[Tang Yun] Zhou Shi cut [Ji Yun] Zhu Shi cut [Yun Hui] All cities cut, and the sound stopped. [Said the text] The base site of the five emperors of heaven and earth also sacrifices to the land. [Historical Records·Qin Benji] Temple God Xihu. [Suoyin's Note] Xianggong was first listed as a vassal, and he lived in the west. Xihu, the name of the county, pretending to be Xihu, Temple Baidi.畤, stop also. It's also where the gods rely. 【Pre-Han · Jiao Si Zhi】Created as a border. The ancient notes of the masters are like a kind of leek in the border, each of which is a soil seal. Also, the temple must be under the mountain, and the fate is called the glutinous rice. The name of the sacrificial place is called 畤. 【Including geographies】Qin Wengong dreamed that the yellow snake was subordinate to the land from the sky, and his mouth was stopped at Kuoyan, and he made a sacrifice to the Baidi in the suburbs, saying Kuan. Qin Xuangong made a sacrifice to Emperor Qian in Weinan, Qin Linggong made a sacrifice to the Yellow Emperor in Wuyang, and a temple to the Yellow Emperor in Xiayuan.　Also place name. 【Thirty Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xiang】Cheng Leng rushed to the ground. [Note] Pinghu, Zhouyi. Also [Four Years of Amour] The Xia Dynasty of the country cuts down on the Jin Dynasty, taking Xie Ren Luanhao, and the Nizhan Yin people Yutuokou. [Later Han·Guangwu Ji] Du Mao and Jia Lan fight in Fanhu. [Note] Fanhu, county name, belongs to Yanmen County. Today's state and counties.　[Guangyun] Shi Zhiqi [Ji Yun] Shi Zhiqi,? Yinshi. And [Guang Yun] straight cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Zhang Li cut,? Yin Zhi. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] Shili cut, sound pheasant. Same with Shi.　[Five Yin Ji Yun] Chi Erqie, Yin Zhe. Chu also. Old glyph
ancient sacrifice
Name meaning
The original meaning was a fixed place for worshipping the five emperors of heaven and earth in ancient times, and also refers to a small piece of land in the water, Xiaozhu.
zhì
I сущ.
1) * возвышение на поле (где приносились жертвы небу, земле и духам пяти стран света)
五畤 жертвенники в честь духов пяти стран света (В., 3., Ю., С. и Зенит)
2) вм. 沚 (мыс, островок)
II гл.
* вм. 峙 (накоплять, запасать)
